description:
To participate you have to do the following:


Make a post with:
• our logo
• tag @iotamons
• write your Soonaverse name in the post


On Soonaverse:
• apply for the 25% DISCOUNT badge
• enter the link to your twitter post in the application box


A maximum of 25 people will receive a spot! Challenge ends on 20th of December.
name: 25% DISCOUNT
